card.name: Abbey Griffin
card.property: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The darkness crawls with vampires and ghouls, but we are not without allies." —Mikaeus, the Lunarch

card.name: Angel of Flight Alabaster
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, return target Spirit card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She endures without Avacyn but secretly asks each soul she guides if it has seen her.

card.name: Angelic Overseer
card.property: Flying As long as you control a Human, Angelic Overseer has hexproof and indestructible.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From mortal hope immortal power springs.

card.name: Avacynian Priest
card.property: {1}, {T}: Tap target non-Human creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Moorlanders speak in awe of the priests' talent for arriving just in time to drive off the wicked things that prowl the ravished parish.

card.name: Bonds of Faith
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as it's a Human. Otherwise, it can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What cannot be destroyed will be bound." —Oath of Avacyn

card.name: Champion of the Parish
card.property: Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of the Parish.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I stand for every cobbler, tanner, and fool in this town—and they stand for me."

card.name: Chapel Geist
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death has bound it with chains of past regrets. Forever it searches for atonement, each kindness removing a single link.

card.name: Cloistered Youth
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may transform Cloistered Youth.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I heard her talking in her sleep—pleading, shrieking, snarling. It was not my daughter's voice. That is not my daughter." —Ekatrin, elder of Hanweir

alternate.name: Unholy Fiend
alternate.property: At the beginning of your end step, you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fiend tormented them by recounting the girl's memories, as if some part of her remained inside that twisted shell.

card.name: Dearly Departed
card.property: Flying As long as Dearly Departed is in your graveyard, each Human creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never forget our ancestors. They have not forgotten us." —Mikaeus, the Lunarch

card.name: Divine Reckoning
card.property: Each player chooses a creature they control. Destroy the rest. Flashback {5}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Doomed Traveler
card.property: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

card.name: Elder Cathar
card.property: When Elder Cathar dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. If that creature is a Human, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My greatest hope is that you will surpass me in every way, consigning my name to some forgotten corner of history."

card.name: Elite Inquisitor
card.property: First strike, vigilance Protection from Vampires, from Werewolves, and from Zombies

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No matter how many I kill, there are always more to hunt. It makes me smile just to think about it."

card.name: Feeling of Dread
card.property: Tap up to two target creatures. Flashback {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: People only say "I'm sure it was nothing" when they're sure it was something.

card.name: Fiend Hunter
card.property: When Fiend Hunter enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature. When Fiend Hunter leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Gallows Warden
card.property: Flying Other Spirit creatures you control get +0/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spirit cares nothing for the crimes or triumphs of the slain. It shelters all beneath its stormy cloak.

card.name: Geist-Honored Monk
card.property: Vigilance Geist-Honored Monk's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control. When Geist-Honored Monk enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Ghostly Possession
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has flying. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.

card.name: Intangible Virtue
card.property: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In life, they were a motley crew: farmers, lords, cutpurses, priests. In death, they are united in singular, benevolent purpose.

card.name: Mausoleum Guard
card.property: When Mausoleum Guard dies, create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ghoulcallers trying to get in, geists trying to get out . . . . This duty is never dull."

card.name: Mentor of the Meek
card.property: Whenever another creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In these halls there is no pass or fail. Your true test comes with the first full moon."

card.name: Midnight Haunting
card.property: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The path back to the world of the living is murky and bewildering. A geist may not even realize that it's terrifying its own loved ones.

card.name: Mikaeus, the Lunarch
card.property: Mikaeus, the Lunarch enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mikaeus. {T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Mikaeus: Put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

card.name: Moment of Heroism
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My faith is stronger than fang, claw, or mindless hunger."

card.name: Nevermore
card.property: As Nevermore enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name. Spells with the chosen name can't be cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By the law of Avacyn, the following thoughts, words, and deeds are henceforth disallowed."

card.name: Paraselene
card.property: Destroy all enchantments. You gain 1 life for each enchantment destroyed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Moonlight has a way of showing all things as they truly are—for better or for worse." —Zilla of Lambholt

card.name: Purify the Grave
card.property: Exile target card from a graveyard. Flashback {W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some priests speak in whispers of the Helvault, a silver prison of unpurged evils.

card.name: Rally the Peasants
card.property: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you must go out at night, bring a mob." —Master of the Elgaud Cathars

card.name: Rebuke
card.property: Destroy target attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No one chooses to be stitched together into a skaab. If it could speak, it would beg for its own destruction." —Thalia, Knight-Cathar

card.name: Selfless Cathar
card.property: {1} {W}, Sacrifice Selfless Cathar: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If I fail to offer myself, we will surely be overrun. My fate would be the same."

card.name: Silverchase Fox
card.property: {1} {W}, Sacrifice Silverchase Fox: Exile target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be careful in your hunt. The clever little creature can steal your wards and lead you right into the werewolf's den." —Britta, midwife of Gatstaf

card.name: Slayer of the Wicked
card.property: When Slayer of the Wicked enters the battlefield, you may destroy target Vampire, Werewolf, or Zombie.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You don't want to see his trophy room.

card.name: Smite the Monstrous
card.property: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though the old holy wards and roadside shrines have begun to fail, faith in Avacyn still holds true power.

card.name: Spare from Evil
card.property: Creatures you control gain protection from non-Human creatures until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As long as we can utter a prayer or lift a weapon, we have the power to fight back." —Thalia, Knight-Cathar

card.name: Spectral Rider
card.property: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Never a word. Never a warning. Only the sound of hoofbeats along the crossways, and the screams of the avenged.

card.name: Stony Silence
card.property: Activated abilities of artifacts can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Let moss grow over gargoyles —Gavony saying meaning "forget painful memories"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've learned to trust my dogs' instincts. When they're calm, I'm calm. And when they get nervous, I get my crossbow." —Hinrik of House Cecani

card.name: Thraben Sentry
card.property: Vigilance Whenever another creature you control dies, you may transform Thraben Sentry.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Looks like it's going to be a quiet night."

alternate.name: Thraben Militia
alternate.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The time for grief is over. The time for retribution has begun."

card.name: Unruly Mob
card.property: Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Unruly Mob.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who says werewolves are the only ones who can hunt as a pack?" —Kolman, elder of Gatstaf

card.name: Urgent Exorcism
card.property: Destroy target Spirit or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To show geists pity is to prolong their agonies. Whether they know it or not, they seek the Blessed Sleep, and we are to give it to them." —Mikaeus, the Lunarch

card.name: Village Bell-Ringer
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Village Bell-Ringer enters the battlefield, untap all creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Priests, hunters, slayers—to arms! The enemy approaches!"

card.name: Voiceless Spirit
card.property: Flying, first strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd rather take on a neckbiter or moonhowler any day. Oh well, looks like I'm going to end up parrying with empty air half the night." —Saint Trogen, the Slayer

card.name: Armored Skaab
card.property: When Armored Skaab enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard.

card.name: Back from the Brink
card.property: Exile a creature card from your graveyard and pay its mana cost: Create a token that's a copy of that card. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Innistrad, death is just a career change.

card.name: Battleground Geist
card.property: Flying Other Spirit creatures you control get +1/+0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not content to nudge vases and chill drawing rooms, some geists muster spectral armies to claw at the hearts of the living.

card.name: Cackling Counterpart
card.property: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. Flashback {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Civilized Scholar
card.property: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. If a creature card is discarded this way, untap Civilized Scholar, then transform it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Me, angry? Of course not. Thanks to my research, I'm above such petty emotions now."

alternate.name: Homicidal Brute
alternate.property: At the beginning of your end step, if Homicidal Brute didn't attack this turn, tap Homicidal Brute, then transform it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For a moment his basest desires run free, unshackled by reason or conscience.

card.name: Claustrophobia
card.property: Enchant creature When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Six feet of earth muffled his cries.

card.name: Curiosity
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Surely you know the joy of the hunt, my furry friend. My kind of hunt just takes a different form than yours."

card.name: Curse of the Bloody Tome
card.property: Enchant player At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After seeing his life's work drip away, the mage decided it was a good time to go crazy.

card.name: Delver of Secrets
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. You may reveal that card. If an instant or sorcery card is revealed this way, transform Delver of Secrets.

alternate.name: Insectile Aberration
alternate.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Unfortunately, all my test animals have died or escaped, so I shall be the final subject. I feel no fear. This is a momentous night." —Laboratory notes, final entry

card.name: Deranged Assistant
card.property: {T}, Put the top card of your library into your graveyard: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Garl, adjust the slurry dispensers. Garl, fetch more corpses. Garl, quit crying and give me your brain tissue. If he doesn't stop being so rude, I'm quitting."

card.name: Dissipate
card.property: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This abomination never belonged in our world. I'm merely setting it free." —Dierk, geistmage

card.name: Dream Twist
card.property: Target player puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard. Flashback {1}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Forbidden Alchemy
card.property: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unbreakable and unappetizing, the crab grows uninterrupted, sometimes to the size of a cottage and beyond.

card.name: Frightful Delusion
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. That player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whether he actually exists is in question, but the terror she feels is excruciatingly real.

card.name: Grasp of Phantoms
card.property: Put target creature on top of its owner's library. Flashback {7}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Hysterical Blindness
card.property: Creatures your opponents control get -4/-0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The panic is amusing, but the real fun comes when the spell passes and the villagers start looking for a scapegoat." —Ludevic, necro-alchemist

card.name: Invisible Stalker
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Invisible Stalker can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All that concerns me is the vampires' sense of smell and those freezing Nephalian nights."

card.name: Laboratory Maniac
card.property: If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His mind whirled with grand plans, never thinking of what might happen if he were to succeed.

card.name: Lantern Spirit
card.property: Flying {U}: Return Lantern Spirit to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bound to the square where she died, she calls out to those in danger—usually scaring them straight into the peril she warns of.

card.name: Lost in the Mist
card.property: Counter target spell. Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The secrets she carried could have saved many lives, but they quietly drowned with her.

card.name: Ludevic's Test Subject
card.property: Defender {1}{U}: Put a hatchling counter on Ludevic's Test Subject. Then if there are five or more hatchling counters on it, remove all of them and transform it.

alternate.name: Ludevic's Abomination
alternate.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After several frustrating experiments, the visionary Ludevic realized he needed to create a monster that fed on torch-wielding mobs.

card.name: Makeshift Mauler
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It always amazes me what perfectly good things people throw away." —Ludevic, necro-alchemist

card.name: Memory's Journey
card.property: Target player shuffles up to three target cards from their graveyard into their library. Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Mindshrieker
card.property: Flying {2}: Target player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard. Mindshrieker gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is that card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Mirror-Mad Phantasm
card.property: Flying {1}{U}: Mirror-Mad Phantasm's owner shuffles it into their library. If that player does, they reveal cards from the top of that library until a card named Mirror-Mad Phantasm is revealed. The player puts that card onto the battlefield and all other cards revealed this way into their graveyard.

card.name: Moon Heron
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The heron is the symbol of the archangel Avacyn. The fact that such spirits still fly gives the church hope that its founder may one day return.

card.name: Murder of Crows
card.property: Flying Whenever another creature dies, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even more than carrion, they crave the last words of the dying.

card.name: Rooftop Storm
card.property: You may pay {0} rather than pay the mana cost for Zombie creature spells you cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let those idiot priests tremble! A new era in unlife begins here and now. Oglor, raise the lightning vane!" —Stitcher Geralf

card.name: Runic Repetition
card.property: Return target exiled card with flashback you own to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What some call obsession, I call the quest for perfection."

card.name: Selhoff Occultist
card.property: Whenever Selhoff Occultist or another creature dies, target player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The mist whispers to those who know it to be more than a mundane fog."

card.name: Sensory Deprivation
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They call it "stitcher's anesthesia," a spell to deaden the senses while the mad doctors begin their grisly work.

card.name: Silent Departure
card.property: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Flashback {4}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The same magic that lets geists pass through our realm can force them out of it.

card.name: Skaab Goliath
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile two creature cards from your graveyard. Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Three heads, six arms, and some armor grafts are better than . . . the normal numbers of those things." —Stitcher Geralf

card.name: Skaab Ruinator
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile three creature cards from your graveyard. Flying You may cast Skaab Ruinator from your graveyard.

card.name: Snapcaster Mage
card.property: Flash When Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Spectral Flight
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The church looks down on binding spirits into armor, but now I can look down on them." —Dierk, geistmage

card.name: Stitched Drake
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your graveyard. Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best skaab are more powerful and more beautiful than the sum of their parts." —Stitcher Geralf

card.name: Stitcher's Apprentice
card.property: {1} {U}, {T}: Create a 2/2 blue Homunculus creature token, then sacrifice a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oglor create life, Oglor take it away. Oglor god! . . . until Master return."

card.name: Sturmgeist
card.property: Flying Sturmgeist's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand. Whenever Sturmgeist deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Think Twice
card.property: Draw a card. Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Either I know just the spell I need, or I'm about to."

card.name: Undead Alchemist
card.property: If a Zombie you control would deal combat damage to a player, instead that player puts that many cards from the top of their library into their graveyard. Whenever a creature card is put into an opponent's graveyard from their library, exile that card and create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

card.name: Abattoir Ghoul
card.property: First strike Whenever a creature dealt damage by Abattoir Ghoul this turn dies, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death took his humanity but not his skill with the knife.

card.name: Altar's Reap
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The demons don't care if we mutter niceties and act out ceremonies. Just kill him." —Bishop Volpaig, servant of Griselbrand

card.name: Army of the Damned
card.property: Create thirteen tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens. Flashback {7}{B}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes death comes knocking. Sometimes it tears down the walls.

card.name: Bitterheart Witch
card.property: Deathtouch When Bitterheart Witch dies, you may search your library for a Curse card, put it onto the battlefield attached to target player, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Bloodgift Demon
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, target player draws a card and loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He relishes the devotion of his Skirsdag puppets and their belief that it will earn them immortality.

card.name: Bloodline Keeper
card.property: Flying {T}: Create a 2/2 black Vampire creature token with flying. {B}: Transform Bloodline Keeper. Activate this ability only if you control five or more Vampires.

alternate.name: Lord of Lineage
alternate.property: Flying Other Vampire creatures you control get +2/+2. {T}: Create a 2/2 black Vampire creature token with flying.

card.name: Brain Weevil
card.property: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) Sacrifice Brain Weevil: Target player discards two cards. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Bump in the Night
card.property: Target opponent loses 3 life. Flashback {5}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not just the wind. It's not all in your head. And it's definitely something to worry about.

card.name: Corpse Lunge
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your graveyard. Corpse Lunge deals damage equal to the exiled card's power to target creature.

card.name: Curse of Death's Hold
card.property: Enchant player Creatures enchanted player controls get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May you and all your kin waste and wither until your clan is no more!"

card.name: Curse of Oblivion
card.property: Enchant player At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player exiles two cards from their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first step to peace is to learn how to forget.

card.name: Dead Weight
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The crueler vampires' idea of free-range farming.

card.name: Diregraf Ghoul
card.property: Diregraf Ghoul enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At least this one still has arms and legs. Well, most of its legs." —Enslow, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

card.name: Disciple of Griselbrand
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The demon Griselbrand dared to stand against Avacyn, earning him the loathing of thousands and the admiration of a few.

card.name: Endless Ranks of the Dead
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is half the number of Zombies you control, rounded down.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With Thraben's army recalled to its city walls, outlying villages were left to fend for themselves.

card.name: Falkenrath Noble
card.property: Flying Whenever Falkenrath Noble or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I often think on how excited they must feel to be chosen as my prey."

card.name: Ghoulcaller's Chant
card.property: Choose one — • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Return two target Zombie cards from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The living are born small and weak. The dead rise ready to serve. The choice is obvious." —Gisa, ghoulcaller of Gavony

card.name: Ghoulraiser
card.property: When Ghoulraiser enters the battlefield, return a Zombie card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Come. Bring your brothers. Tonight, you feast on living flesh." —Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

card.name: Gruesome Deformity
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has intimidate. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She wanted to inspire terror wherever she went. The demons happily granted her wish.

card.name: Heartless Summoning
card.property: Creature spells you cast cost {2} less to cast. Creatures you control get -1/-1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They won't be winning any beauty pageants, but they'll do the trick." —Enslow, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

card.name: Liliana of the Veil
card.property: +1: Each player discards a card. −2: Target player sacrifices a creature. −6: Separate all permanents target player controls into two piles. That player sacrifices all permanents in the pile of their choice.

card.name: Manor Skeleton
card.property: Haste {1}{B}: Regenerate Manor Skeleton.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lungs dried to parchment wheeze blasphemies within a cage of bleached bone.

card.name: Markov Patrician
card.property: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vampires of the Markov bloodline pride themselves on their exquisite taste in fashion, art, and "wine of the vein."

card.name: Maw of the Mire
card.property: Destroy target land. You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the chapel was dragged under, the bell in the tower rang until the murky depths forever silenced its toll.

card.name: Moan of the Unhallowed
card.property: Create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens. Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For a ghoul, every village is a buffet and every disaster is a reunion.

card.name: Morkrut Banshee
card.property: Morbid — When Morkrut Banshee enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let go your grudges, or risk wandering the bogs forever in a murderous rage." —Hildin, priest of Avacyn

card.name: Night Terrors
card.property: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Innistrad is a place where dreams invade the mind and mere shadows exact a terrible toll.

card.name: Reaper from the Abyss
card.property: Flying Morbid — At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, destroy target non-Demon creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Avacyn has deserted you. I welcome your devotion in her stead."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its venom sacs are long gone, but its crushing strength is somehow greater than ever.

card.name: Screeching Bat
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {2}{B}{B}. If you do, transform Screeching Bat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bat has such clarity of hearing that simple sounds become symphonies.

alternate.name: Stalking Vampire
alternate.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {2}{B}{B}. If you do, transform Stalking Vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each form she takes is an exploration of the senses.

card.name: Sever the Bloodline
card.property: Exile target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature. Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Skeletal Grimace
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "{B}: Regenerate this creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And then I realized we all have skeletons on the inside. Why wait until the bodies are dead to control them?" —Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

card.name: Skirsdag High Priest
card.property: Morbid — {T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying. Activate this ability only if a creature died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Thraben's pleas fall on deaf ears. Ours do not."

card.name: Stromkirk Patrol
card.property: Whenever Stromkirk Patrol deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You'd best move along, human. Our palates are far less discerning than our master's."

card.name: Tribute to Hunger
card.property: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Marella was delighted. The ball had attracted so many suitors for her daughter, including that handsome stranger. She wondered where the two were now . . . .

card.name: Typhoid Rats
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kidnappers caught in Havengul are given two choices: languish in prison or become rat catchers. The smart ones go to prison.

card.name: Unbreathing Horde
card.property: Unbreathing Horde enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other Zombie you control and each Zombie card in your graveyard. If Unbreathing Horde would be dealt damage, prevent that damage and remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

card.name: Unburial Rites
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Flashback {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All crave the Blessed Sleep. Few receive it.

card.name: Vampire Interloper
card.property: Flying Vampire Interloper can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He listens to every heartbeat, deciding which one of hundreds he will stop.

card.name: Victim of Night
card.property: Destroy target non-Vampire, non-Werewolf, non-Zombie creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not touch a drop. Not yet. I want to watch this so-called slayer's last crisis of faith." —Olivia Voldaren

card.name: Village Cannibals
card.property: Whenever another Human creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Village Cannibals.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some have endured the horrors of Innistrad by becoming the worst monsters of all.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Is it hopeless? When wave upon wave of our dead return as mindless flesh-eaters to claw upon Thraben's walls? We're too busy cutting them down to indulge ourselves in such philosophical foppery." —Mikaeus, the Lunarch

card.name: Ancient Grudge
card.property: Destroy target artifact. Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If there's anything a werewolf hates, it's a collar—especially Avacyn's Collar, the symbol of her church.

card.name: Ashmouth Hound
card.property: Whenever Ashmouth Hound blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Ashmouth Hound deals 1 damage to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its fiery paws make it easy to track, which is very useful when you want to go in exactly the opposite direction.

card.name: Balefire Dragon
card.property: Flying Whenever Balefire Dragon deals combat damage to a player, it deals that much damage to each creature that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If it comes for you, die boldly or die swiftly—for die you will.

card.name: Blasphemous Act
card.property: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield. Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Holy places are no longer sanctuary from death, and death is no longer sanctuary from anything." —Thalia, Knight-Cathar

card.name: Bloodcrazed Neonate
card.property: Bloodcrazed Neonate attacks each combat if able. Whenever Bloodcrazed Neonate deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While elder vampires select their meals with care, the newly sired frenzy at the first whiff.

card.name: Brimstone Volley
card.property: Brimstone Volley deals 3 damage to any target. Morbid — Brimstone Volley deals 5 damage to that permanent or player instead if a creature died this turn.

card.name: Burning Vengeance
card.property: Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard, Burning Vengeance deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mist is the geists' sorrow. Wind is their pain. Fire is their vengeance.

card.name: Charmbreaker Devils
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, return an instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard to your hand. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Charmbreaker Devils gets +4/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Crossway Vampire
card.property: When Crossway Vampire enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not flatter Fate. It did not guide you into my clutches tonight. That was all my doing."

card.name: Curse of Stalked Prey
card.property: Enchant player Whenever a creature deals combat damage to enchanted player, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Innocent thorns can fill the air with your bloodscent. Don't stray from the path." —Elmut, crossway watcher

card.name: Curse of the Nightly Hunt
card.property: Enchant player Creatures enchanted player controls attack each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the moon rises and the bloodlust takes hold, nothing matters but the kill.

card.name: Curse of the Pierced Heart
card.property: Enchant player At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, Curse of the Pierced Heart deals 1 damage to that player or a planeswalker that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May your veins weep, and may every vampire take notice." —Stensian curse

card.name: Desperate Ravings
card.property: Draw two cards, then discard a card at random. Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her mind was quite gone, yet she spoke nothing but truth.

card.name: Devil's Play
card.property: Devil's Play deals X damage to any target. Flashback {X}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A devil's hands are never idle.

card.name: Falkenrath Marauders
card.property: Flying, haste Whenever Falkenrath Marauders deals combat damage to a player, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No slinking in the dark for them, no luring whispers. They claim their prey in the speed and glory of the hunt.

card.name: Feral Ridgewolf
card.property: Trample {1}{R}: Feral Ridgewolf gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The wolves no longer hunt just to feed. They kill for sport, or for some madness behind their eyes." —Elmut, crossway watcher

card.name: Furor of the Bitten
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who only believe themselves infected with lycanthropy can be as dangerous as those who really are.

card.name: Geistflame
card.property: Geistflame deals 1 damage to any target. Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Innistrad pyromancers find their best raw materials in the fury of the dead.

card.name: Hanweir Watchkeep
card.property: Defender At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Hanweir Watchkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He scans for wolves, knowing there's one he can never anticipate.

alternate.name: Bane of Hanweir
alternate.property: Bane of Hanweir attacks each combat if able. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Bane of Hanweir.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Technically he never left his post. He looks after the wolf wherever it goes.

card.name: Harvest Pyre
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile X cards from your graveyard. Harvest Pyre deals X damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Corpses destroyed by fire form the most destructive geists.

card.name: Heretic's Punishment
card.property: {3} {R}: Choose any target, then put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard. Heretic's Punishment deals damage to that permanent or player equal to the highest converted mana cost among those cards.

card.name: Infernal Plunge
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Add {R}{R}{R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oh mighty Griselbrand, Scourge of the Heedless World, gladly I consume myself for thee!"

card.name: Instigator Gang
card.property: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0. At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Instigator Gang.

alternate.name: Wildblood Pack
alternate.property: Trample Attacking creatures you control get +3/+0. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Wildblood Pack.

card.name: Into the Maw of Hell
card.property: Destroy target land. Into the Maw of Hell deals 13 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few entrances lead to where demons and devils lurk. Unfortunately, they occasionally open new ones.

card.name: Kessig Wolf
card.property: {1} {R}: Kessig Wolf gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't be afraid when you hear the wolves howl. Be afraid when you don't hear them at all." —Saint Trogen, the Slayer

card.name: Kruin Outlaw
card.property: First strike At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Kruin Outlaw.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hold tight. I've got a surprise for them."

alternate.name: Terror of Kruin Pass
alternate.property: Double strike Werewolves you control have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Terror of Kruin Pass.

card.name: Night Revelers
card.property: Night Revelers has haste as long as an opponent controls a Human.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vampires think of themselves as the indisputable nobility of Innistrad, able to do as they please. There are few who can prove them wrong.

card.name: Nightbird's Clutches
card.property: Up to two target creatures can't block this turn. Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shiny polished silver can ward off many creatures, but it attracts others.

card.name: Past in Flames
card.property: Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Pitchburn Devils
card.property: When Pitchburn Devils dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ingenuity of goblins, the depravity of demons, and the smarts of sheep.

card.name: Rage Thrower
card.property: Whenever another creature dies, Rage Thrower deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some lament these haunted times, but I'm a geistflame-tank-half-full kind of person."

card.name: Rakish Heir
card.property: Whenever a Vampire you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you're not having fun, what's the point of living forever?"

card.name: Reckless Waif
card.property: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Reckless Waif.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yes, I'm alone. No, I'm not worried."

alternate.name: Merciless Predator
alternate.property: At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Merciless Predator.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before she just wanted to snatch your purse; now she'll take the whole arm.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Devils are demons' unearthly desires made flesh. Let loose on the world, they satisfy their mad craving for destruction in a whirlwind of chaos.

card.name: Rolling Temblor
card.property: Rolling Temblor deals 2 damage to each creature without flying. Flashback {4}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When demons open a path to your front door, it's time to move.

card.name: Scourge of Geier Reach
card.property: Scourge of Geier Reach gets +1/+1 for each creature your opponents control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stensian villagers mourned the loss of human life. Thraben vampire slayers mourned the loss of living wood.

card.name: Skirsdag Cultist
card.property: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skirsdag Cultist deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Within blood is life. Within life is fire. Within fire is the path to our masters' glory!"

card.name: Stromkirk Noble
card.property: Stromkirk Noble can't be blocked by Humans. Whenever Stromkirk Noble deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A responsible king walks among his subjects."

card.name: Tormented Pariah
card.property: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Tormented Pariah.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hey lads, the moon's rising. All the better to watch him beg for mercy."

alternate.name: Rampaging Werewolf
alternate.property: At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Rampaging Werewolf.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just look at him, groveling on all fours! What a pathetic—uh-oh."

card.name: Traitorous Blood
card.property: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains trample and haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can make you dance to my tune like a puppet, your very blood eager to obey." —Olivia Voldaren

card.name: Vampiric Fury
card.property: Vampire creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many peasants secretly admire vampires' glamour and elegance—until they witness a moment of pure bloodlust.

card.name: Village Ironsmith
card.property: First strike At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Village Ironsmith.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each night, he abandons the trappings of civilization.

alternate.name: Ironfang
alternate.property: First strike At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Ironfang.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each morning, he repairs the front door.

card.name: Ambush Viper
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Living creatures seldom impress me. But I like this one." —Uta Falkenrath

card.name: Avacyn's Pilgrim
card.property: {T}: Add {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Avacyn's protection is everywhere. From the holy church to the sacred glade, all that we see is under her blessed watch."

card.name: Boneyard Wurm
card.property: Boneyard Wurm's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only thing it likes more than discovering a pit of bones is adding to it.

card.name: Bramblecrush
card.property: Destroy target noncreature permanent.

card.name: Caravan Vigil
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. Morbid — You may put that card onto the battlefield instead of putting it into your hand if a creature died this turn.

card.name: Creeping Renaissance
card.property: Choose a permanent type. Return all cards of the chosen type from your graveyard to your hand. Flashback {5}{G}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Darkthicket Wolf
card.property: {2} {G}: Darkthicket Wolf gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Werewolf slayers don't know for certain how werewolves are created. So they kill all the wolves, just to be safe.

card.name: Daybreak Ranger
card.property: {T}: Daybreak Ranger deals 2 damage to target creature with flying. At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Daybreak Ranger.

alternate.name: Nightfall Predator
alternate.property: {R}, {T}: Nightfall Predator fights target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.) At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Nightfall Predator.

card.name: Elder of Laurels
card.property: {3} {G}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hopes and prayers can carry the same force as swords and torches.

card.name: Essence of the Wild
card.property: Creatures you control enter the battlefield as a copy of Essence of the Wild.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wander too far into the wild and it may take you for its own.

card.name: Festerhide Boar
card.property: Trample Morbid — Festerhide Boar enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if a creature died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bury your dead deep. The boars are hungriest while the corpse is still warm." —Paulin, trapper of Somberwald

card.name: Full Moon's Rise
card.property: Werewolf creatures you control get +1/+0 and have trample. Sacrifice Full Moon's Rise: Regenerate all Werewolf creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some lycanthropes wish they could abandon their weak human shapes and revel in the power of the wolf.

card.name: Garruk Relentless
card.property: When Garruk Relentless has two or fewer loyalty counters on him, transform him. 0: Garruk Relentless deals 3 damage to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to him. 0: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

alternate.name: Garruk, the Veil-Cursed
alternate.property: +1: Create a 1/1 black Wolf creature token with deathtouch. −1: Sacrifice a creature. If you do, search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. −3: Creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Gatstaf Shepherd
card.property: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Gatstaf Shepherd.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What is worse than a wolf in sheep's clothing?" —Wolfhunter's riddle

alternate.name: Gatstaf Howler
alternate.property: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Gatstaf Howler.

card.name: Gnaw to the Bone
card.property: You gain 2 life for each creature card in your graveyard. Flashback {2}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Grave Bramble
card.property: Defender, protection from Zombies

card.name: Grizzled Outcasts
card.property: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Grizzled Outcasts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Seen as unsavory, the hunters were never allowed in town—until one night they vanished.

alternate.name: Krallenhorde Wantons
alternate.property: At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Krallenhorde Wantons.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The boot prints became paw prints, and they led right back into town.

card.name: Gutter Grime
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, put a slime counter on Gutter Grime, then create a green Ooze creature token with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of slime counters on Gutter Grime."

card.name: Hamlet Captain
card.property: Whenever Hamlet Captain attacks or blocks, other Humans you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I would fear this fight, bloodsucker, were I alone."

card.name: Hollowhenge Scavenger
card.property: Morbid — When Hollowhenge Scavenger enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, you gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After werewolves slaughtered the citizenry of Hollowhenge, other creatures moved in.

card.name: Kessig Cagebreakers
card.property: Whenever Kessig Cagebreakers attacks, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token that's tapped and attacking for each creature card in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They put bars on these noble beasts and then wonder why werewolves target our towns."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the forest villages of Kessig, parents feed their children wormwood and other bitter herbs, hoping to make them less palatable to things that roam the night.

card.name: Lumberknot
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Lumberknot.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Animated by geists fused in its oak, it hungers for more life to add to its core.

card.name: Make a Wish
card.property: Return two cards at random from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Gavony wishing is taken as a sign of weakness, yet the wells usually brim with silver.

card.name: Mayor of Avabruck
card.property: Other Human creatures you control get +1/+1. At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Mayor of Avabruck.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He can deny his true nature for only so long.

alternate.name: Howlpack Alpha
alternate.property: Each other creature you control that's a Werewolf or a Wolf gets +1/+1. At the beginning of your end step, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Howlpack Alpha.

card.name: Moldgraf Monstrosity
card.property: Trample When Moldgraf Monstrosity dies, exile it, then return two creature cards at random from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The border between life and death is as thin as a layer of topsoil.

card.name: Moonmist
card.property: Transform all Humans. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures other than Werewolves and Wolves. (Only double-faced cards can be transformed.)

card.name: Mulch
card.property: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The land knows no difference between the graves of commoners and nobles.

card.name: Naturalize
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stone and thought fade into ruin. Only the wind in the leaves will endure." —Tomb inscription

card.name: Orchard Spirit
card.property: Orchard Spirit can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pick not the rotten fruit, but neither touch the best. Leave those as an offering for our unseen guests." —Radwick, farmer of Gatstaf

card.name: Parallel Lives
card.property: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There will come a time when the only prey left will be each other." —Ulrich of Krallenhorde Pack

card.name: Prey Upon
card.property: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You don't find many old werewolf hunters." —Paulin, trapper of Somberwald

card.name: Ranger's Guile
card.property: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the remote corners of Kessig, protection is found in secret powers unknown to the Church of Avacyn.

card.name: Somberwald Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Morbid — Somberwald Spider enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if a creature died this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stensian vampires encourage spiders near their manors so they can rob the webs.

card.name: Spider Spawning
card.property: Create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach for each creature card in your graveyard. Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Spidery Grasp
card.property: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+4 and gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nobody's seen the Lady of Videns for years. Poor dear, no companions at all in that old castle." —Yonda of Gavony

card.name: Splinterfright
card.property: Trample Splinterfright's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard. At the beginning of your upkeep, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

card.name: Travel Preparations
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures. Flashback {1}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Visiting a shrine at the start of a journey makes the traveler more likely to finish it.

card.name: Tree of Redemption
card.property: Defender {T}: Exchange your life total with Tree of Redemption's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The executioner's tree in Thraben Cathedral holds the power to absolve more than the souls of the hanged.

card.name: Ulvenwald Mystics
card.property: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Ulvenwald Mystics.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With this ritual, we cast aside our fragile humanity . . ."

alternate.name: Ulvenwald Primordials
alternate.property: {G}: Regenerate Ulvenwald Primordials. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Ulvenwald Primordials.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ". . . and embrace the ancient ferocity of the undying Wild."

card.name: Villagers of Estwald
card.property: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Villagers of Estwald.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You can spot a werewolf-infested town by its lack of butcher shops.

alternate.name: Howlpack of Estwald
alternate.property: At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Howlpack of Estwald.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Estwald's citizens don't dislike outsiders—they taste just fine.

card.name: Woodland Sleuth
card.property: Morbid — When Woodland Sleuth enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, return a creature card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whatever did this is near. Death reversion has not yet occurred. Be alert!"

card.name: Wreath of Geists
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before you travel the woods of Kessig, first get permission from those who died trying.

card.name: Evil Twin
card.property: You may have Evil Twin enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it has "{U}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature with the same name as this creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You can always tell the evil one by the dagger he's sticking in you.

card.name: Geist of Saint Traft
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Whenever Geist of Saint Traft attacks, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.

card.name: Grimgrin, Corpse-Born
card.property: Grimgrin, Corpse-Born enters the battlefield tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step. Sacrifice another creature: Untap Grimgrin and put a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever Grimgrin attacks, destroy target creature defending player controls, then put a +1/+1 counter on Grimgrin.

card.name: Olivia Voldaren
card.property: Flying {1}{R}: Olivia Voldaren deals 1 damage to another target creature. That creature becomes a Vampire in addition to its other types. Put a +1/+1 counter on Olivia Voldaren. {3}{B}{B}: Gain control of target Vampire for as long as you control Olivia Voldaren.

card.name: Blazing Torch
card.property: Equipped creature can't be blocked by Vampires or Zombies. Equipped creature has "{T}, Sacrifice Blazing Torch: Blazing Torch deals 2 damage to any target." Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Butcher's Cleaver

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Outside the safety of Thraben, there is little distinction between tool and weapon.

card.name: Cellar Door
card.property: {3}, {T}: Target player puts the bottom card of their library into their graveyard. If it's a creature card, you create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As if anyone needed another reason to avoid dark, dank cellars.

card.name: Cobbled Wings
card.property: Equipped creature has flying. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the necro-alchemist, any puzzle can be solved with intelligence and harvested body parts.

card.name: Creepy Doll
card.property: Indestructible Whenever Creepy Doll deals combat damage to a creature, flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A child's porcelain doll went missing one night, as did a pair of kitchen shears and the town magistrate.

card.name: Demonmail Hauberk
card.property: Equipped creature gets +4/+2. Equip—Sacrifice a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It comes off as easily as your own skin.

card.name: Galvanic Juggernaut
card.property: Galvanic Juggernaut attacks each combat if able. Galvanic Juggernaut doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever another creature dies, untap Galvanic Juggernaut.

card.name: Geistcatcher's Rig
card.property: When Geistcatcher's Rig enters the battlefield, you may have it deal 4 damage to target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rigs were outlawed except in Nephalia, where malign spirits are as plentiful as crazed inventors.

card.name: Ghoulcaller's Bell
card.property: {T}: Each player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The bell's chime heralds the rise of the unhallowed from the grave and the fall of their victims into the earth.

card.name: Graveyard Shovel
card.property: {2}, {T}: Target player exiles a card from their graveyard. If it's a creature card, you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thanks to Havengul's thriving illegal market for corpses, the shovel that interred a body during the day is usually the same one digging it out at night.

card.name: Grimoire of the Dead
card.property: {1}, {T}, Discard a card: Put a study counter on Grimoire of the Dead. {T}, Remove three study counters from Grimoire of the Dead and sacrifice it: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control. They're black Zombies in addition to their other colors and types.

card.name: Inquisitor's Flail
Manor Gargoyle
card.property: Defender Manor Gargoyle has indestructible as long as it has defender. {1}: Until end of turn, Manor Gargoyle loses defender and gains flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing could break it but the fall.

card.name: Mask of Avacyn
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+2 and has hexproof. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Equip {3}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It hides the face and protects the soul.

card.name: One-Eyed Scarecrow
card.property: Defender Creatures with flying your opponents control get -1/-0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Farmhands and priests mutter curses at the ragged thing; it unnerves more than just the crows.

card.name: Runechanter's Pike
card.property: Equipped creature has first strike and gets +X/+0, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As sharp as its bearer's words of faith.

card.name: Sharpened Pitchfork

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not everyone can have a sword of blessed silver. Not everyone needs one, either.

card.name: Silver-Inlaid Dagger

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Magical etchings turned a whittler's tool into a wolfhunter's weapon.

card.name: Traveler's Amulet
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rider set off into the eerie mist, swaddled in armor and laden with amulets.

card.name: Trepanation Blade
card.property: Whenever equipped creature attacks, defending player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card. The creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each card revealed this way. That player puts the revealed cards into their graveyard. Equip {2}

card.name: Witchbane Orb
card.property: When Witchbane Orb enters the battlefield, destroy all Curses attached to you. You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control, including Aura spells.)

card.name: Wooden Stake
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+0. Whenever equipped creature blocks or becomes blocked by a Vampire, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Clifftop Retreat
card.property: Clifftop Retreat enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Plains. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where cathars learn to fight not only demons and vampires, but ignorance as well.

card.name: Gavony Township
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {2}{G}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The protective wards of the church have weakened, and no one can tell us why. It's time to look to our own defenses." —Gregel, militia leader

card.name: Ghost Quarter
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Ghost Quarter: Destroy target land. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle their library.

card.name: Hinterland Harbor
card.property: Hinterland Harbor enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or an Island. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In places where the sea meets the trees, it's easy to forget the darkness that rules most of Innistrad.

card.name: Isolated Chapel
card.property: Isolated Chapel enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or a Swamp. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not every church is a place of faith.

card.name: Kessig Wolf Run
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {X}{R}{G}, {T}: Target creature gets +X/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When a werewolf changes for the first time, that first howl is said to echo through the wilds till moonset.

card.name: Moorland Haunt
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {W}{U}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

card.name: Nephalia Drownyard
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}{U}{B}, {T}: Target player puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some see a coastal disaster. I see a fully-stocked seagraf." —Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

card.name: Shimmering Grotto
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is the price of being last in the food chain. We must keep our places of beauty hidden away instead of displayed for all to see." —Hildin, priest of Avacyn

card.name: Stensia Bloodhall
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {3}{B}{R}, {T}: Stensia Bloodhall deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The revelry ends when the supply of fresh ingenues runs dry.

card.name: Sulfur Falls
card.property: Sulfur Falls enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Mountain. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Skirsdag cultists meet behind a waterfall's curtain and plot with demonic forces.

card.name: Woodland Cemetery
card.property: Woodland Cemetery enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Forest. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Farmers cut the trees and buried their dead. The dead rose up and killed the farmers. The trees grew back and strangled the dead.
